about_the_game:
Set sail on a high-seas adventure with the SteamWorld Heist II Official Soundtrack!

Immerse yourself in the rich, handcrafted environments of SteamWorld Heist II with tunes that perfectly complement every twist and turn of your journey. Whether you’re strategising your next move, battling foes in intense battles, exploring the oceanic shores of the Great Sea Shard, or taking a rest at one of the many lively bars, this soundtrack delivers the perfect backdrop.

Featuring exclusive tracks by the renowned Steam Powered Giraffe, this soundtrack blends steampunk charm with innovative soundscapes, creating an unforgettable auditory experience.

Grab your copy of the SteamWorld Heist II Official Soundtrack now and let the heisting begin!
